title: BLAZBLUE CS
description: (Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB)  The Games on Demand version supports  English, Japanese, Korean, Chinese. Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual".   The newest installment of one of the world’s top 2D fighting games has come to the Xbox 360! BlazBlue: Continuum Shift is the latest entry in the mega-successful BlazBlue series and builds upon the solid gameplay of its predecessor. In addition to containing the superior online play and in-depth story mode for which the series is justifiably celebrated for, BlazBlue: Continuum Shift also introduces a comprehensive tutorial mode for those new to the game, as well as a challenge mode that tests and refines the skills of both intermediate and advanced players. With both the quantity and quality of content in the game, BlazBlue is one of the greatest fighting games ever made.

childDownloads.title: Additional Character Colors #1
childDownloads.description: The first batch of additional colors. Includes Ragna, Jin, Noel, Rachel, Taokaka, Tager, Litchi, Arakune, Bang, Carl, Hakumen, Lambda, Tsubaki, Hazama, and Mu's colors. Each character will receive four additional colors. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Additional Character Colors #2
childDownloads.description: The second batch of additional colors. Includes Ragna, Jin, Noel, Rachel, Taokaka, Rager, Litchi, Arakune, Bang, Carl, Hakumen, Lambda, Tsubaki, Hazama, and Mu's colors. childDownloads.title: Additional Character Colors #3

childDownloads.title: Additional Playable Character "Valkenhayn R. Hellsing"
childDownloads.description: You can now use the new character, Valkenhayn. This DLC package comes with the Unlimited version and all 12 additional colors.

childDownloads.title: Additional Playable Character "Makoto Nanaya"
childDownloads.description: You can now use the new character, Makoto. This DLC package comes with the Unlimited version and all 12 additional colors. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Additional System Voice Type-C
childDownloads.description: This DLC will add the option to switch the announcer's voice of the game to that of Taokaka. There are two versions included in this package. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Additional System Voice Type-K
childDownloads.description: This DLC will add the option to switch the announcer's voice of the game to that of Jin Kisaragi. There are two versions included in this package. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Additional System Voice Type-M
childDownloads.description: This DLC will add the option to switch the announcer's voice of the game to that of Sawashiro Miyuki. There are two versions included in this package. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Additional Playable Character "Platinum the Trinity"
childDownloads.description: You can now use the new character, Platinum. This DLC package comes with the Unlimited version and all 12 additional colors.

childDownloads.title: Gamer Picture Pack: Rebel 1
childDownloads.description: Gamer Picture Pack beautifully drawn by Katou Yuuki, the main illustrator for Blaze Blue: Continuum Shift. This pack includes: Ragna, Jin, Noel, Rachel, Carl, Nirvana, Hakumen, Tsubaki, Hazama, and Terumi.

childDownloads.title: Gamer Picture Pack: Rebel 2
childDownloads.description: Gamer Picture Pack beautifully drawn by Katou Yuuki, the main illustrator for Blaze Blue: Continuum Shift. This pack includes: Taokaka, Tager, Litchi, Arakune, Bang, Lambda, Mu, Nu, Kokonoe, and Makoto.

childDownloads.title: Gamer Picture Pack: Rebel 3
childDownloads.description: Gamer Pictures included in this "NOL" pack were created using Sugiyama Yuki’s beautifully illustrated story mode images. Includes: Jin, Noel, Tsubaki , Makoto and Carl, both in their NOL academy uniform, and regular regalia. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
